Summary: triangle with 3 recessed lights moving at an odd angle
divs: Sighting DetailsMy uncle vern reported the following event on a christmas visit, he was in the front yard of his sons home in texas when vern noticed a dark slit moveing toward them, they watched as this object went over them both with no noise, he told me it was flat had 3 recessed light like in a ceiling, it appeared to be at 2500 Feet they watched as it moved out of veiw, my uncle is not one for lieing, he said he saw this object then its something to ponder on. Im making this report on his behalf as he may have further details of thickness and the size.note the object was moving from corner to corner with one sticking out side ways?
